title: SFF-8636 Rev 2.11 Upper Page 00h
description: JSON Format for SFF-8636 Rev 2.11 Upper Page 00h

enum: SFP/SFP+/SFP28 and later with SFF-8472 management interface

QSFP28 or later with SFF-8636 management interface (SFF-8665 et al.)
Shielded Mini Multilane HD 4X Fanout Cable
Shielded Mini Multilane HD 8X Fanout Cable
SFP-DD Double Density 2X Pluggable Transceiver with SFP-DD Management Interface Specification
DSFP Dual Small Form Factor Pluggable Transceiver
QSFP+ or later with Common Management Interface Specification (CMIS)

SFP+ and later with Common Management Interface Specification (CMIS)

OIF-ELSFP with Common Management interface Specification (CMIS)

CDFP (x8 PCIe) SFF-TA-1032 with Common Management interface Specification (CMIS)
CDFP (x16 PCIe) SFF-TA-1032 with Common Management interface Specification (CMIS)
Power Class 4 (3.5 W max.) and Power Classes 5, 6 or 7
HSSDC II (High Speed Serial Data Connector)

required: Shortwave laser w/o OFC (SN) compliant (Byte 136, Bit 6)
Shortwave laser w OFC (SL) compliant (Byte 136, Bit 5)

enum: Copper cable, near and far end limiting active equalizers
Copper cable, far end limiting active equalizers

25GBASE-CR CA-25G-S or 50GBASE-CR2 with BASE-R (Clause 74 Fire code) FEC
10 Mb/s Single Pair Ethernet (802.3cg, Clause 146/147, 1000 m copper)

G959.1 profile P1S1-2D2 (10709 MBd, 40km, 1550 nm SM)
G959.1 profile P1L1-2D2 (10709 MBd, 80km, 1550 nm SM)

100G ACC, retimed or 25GAUI C2M ACC. Providing a worst BER of 10-12 or below

4WDM-40 MSA (40km reach with APD receiver and RS(528,514) FEC in host system)

100GBASE-VR1 (802.3, Clause 167), CAUI-4 (no FEC on host interface)

required: Tx input adaptive equalizers freeze capable (Byte 193, Bit 4)
Tx input equalizers auto-adaptive capable (Byte 193, Bit 3)
Tx input equalizers fixed-programmable settings implemented (Byte 193, Bit 2)
Rx output emphasis fixed-programmable settings implemented (Byte 193, Bit 1)
Rx output amplitude fixed-programmable settings implemented (Byte 193, Bit 0)
Tx CDR On/Off Control implemented (Byte 194, Bit 7)
Rx CDR On/Off Control implemented (Byte 194, Bit 6)
Tx CDR Loss of Lock (LOL) flag implemented (Byte 194, Bit 5)
Rx CDR Loss of Lock (LOL) flag implemented. (Byte 194, Bit 4)
Rate select is implemented as defined in Section 6.2.7 (Byte 195, Bit 5)
Tx Squelch implemented to reduce Pave (Byte 195, Bit 2)
